column4: PS2 (PAL version) reports "TV system doesn't match."   Disk was created with "Dvd95 1.6p0" from PAL 6.4 GB original PAL disk down to 4.4 GB.
perhaps the DVD disk is not compatible with the PAL System software.
original disk is PAL - PAL is a format for TV Receivers
original disk is PAL format, 6.4 GB.  Dvd95 produced a 4.4 GB disk: this disk is rejected by PS2 as "TV system doesn't match."
it may be just a simple disk replacement such as a DVD-R    -N      or a Read Write issue and not a software issue.
I was in a quandry after seeing all of the different disks and softwares to be installed and used.j
